title: BRIEF-Aus Tin Mining To Undertake Strategic Review Of Granville Operation
text:
BRIEF-Aus Tin Mining To Undertake Strategic Review Of Granville Operation

Commodities 8 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 10:01)

BRIEF-Aus Tin Mining To Undertake Strategic Review Of Granville Operation Sept 20 (Reuters) - Aus Tin Mining Ltd : * TO UNDERTAKE A STRATEGIC REVIEW OF GRANVILLE OPERATION FOLLOWING A DISRUPTION TO MINING ACTIVITIES * DURING THIS PERIOD COSTS FOR MINE ARE BEING REDUCED AND STAFF REQUESTED TO TAKE ANNUAL LEAVE * STRATEGIC REVIEW IS EXPECTED TO TAKE A NUMBER OF WEEKS * TO DEFER FURTHER WORK ON TARONGA STAGE 1 DEVELOPMENT INCORPORATING TRIAL MINE AND PILOT PROCESSING

BRIEF-Aus Tin Mining To Undertake Strategic Review Of Granville Operation
description: BRIEF-Aus Tin Mining To Undertake Strategic Review Of Granville Operation
